title: trouble with google, they have my phone and have failed to keep contact with me and now ignore me!
content: so this is the second issue i have had with  google, they have failed to  return my emails and every time i talk on chat they try to say they will email me, i have now been in chat for 6 hours and they are now not responding after i was told I'm in a que  to talk to the manger when i wouldn't agree to be emailed,  possible legal?
